DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , comparative , multicenter study assess impact patient support program ( MinSupport Plus ) health relate quality life ( HRQoL ) adherence subject relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis administer Rebif® RebiSmart™ device .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 4 Study Assess Impact Patient Support Program Health Related Quality Life Adherence Subjects With Relapsing-Remitting Multiple Sclerosis Administered Rebif® With RebiSmart™ Device
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 old A diagnosis relapsingremitting multiple sclerosis accord revise McDonald Criteria ( 2010 ) Treatment Rebif® 22 44 mcg subcutaneously three time week accordance Summary product characteristic Rebif® administer RebiSmart™ device Provided sign informed consent form Has receive component , except technical support , MinSupport Plus prior study entry Has difficulty read and/or understand Swedish Has mental condition render subject unable understand nature , scope possible consequence study , and/or evidence uncooperative attitude No access computer Participation another clinical study
